solution_line_template: On Wednesday, Liza had ${initial_balance} - ${rent} = $<<{initial_balance}-{rent}={after_rent}>>{after_rent} left in her account.
After depositing on Thursday, she had ${after_rent} + ${paycheck} = $<<{after_rent}+{paycheck}={after_paycheck}>>{after_paycheck} in her account.
On Friday, she paid a total of ${electricity_bill} + ${internet_bill} = $<<{electricity_bill}+{internet_bill}={total_utilities}>>{total_utilities} for her electricity and internet bills.
So, ${after_paycheck} - ${total_utilities} = $<<{after_paycheck}-{total_utilities}={after_utilities}>>{after_utilities} was left on her account on Friday.
After paying her phone bill, Liza has ${after_utilities} - ${phone_bill} = $<<{after_utilities}-{phone_bill}={after_phone}>>{after_phone} left in her account.
